channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire; INC#0686; 10:54AM; 2426 E Manitou Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45sVOhX; #LincolnHeights; Large one-story commercial with fire showing .; FS 1; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 CM20 CM22 E10 E16 E2 E201 E202 E203 E212 E250 E3 E44 E55 EM1 HR3 RA12 RA2 RA801 RA803 RA844 SQ21 T1 T12 T2 T3 T50 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1352; 06:40PM; 4266 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EbCTw2; #VermontSquare; LAFD firefighters coordinated their efforts to carefully protect items in the fourplex, before opening up the ceiling and roof to access fire in the attic with hose lines. Ultimately, it took 30 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E233 E33 E46 E66 RA15 RA46 RA846 SQ21 T15 T33; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1352; 06:18PM; 4266 S Hoover St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3EbCTw2; #VermontSquare; Two-story four-plex with moderate smoke showing from the roof (suspected attic fire). Crews will begin salvage operations to protect belongings below, before deploying hose lines in the attic and ventilating the roof. Offensive mode.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E46 E66 RA46 RA846 T15; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

Agency Assist; INC#1284; 05:44PM; 5440 W San Fernando Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3sxR3oM; #AtwaterVillage; PRELIM: Metrolink Antelope Valley Line (outbound) passenger Train #269 reportedly struck one vehicle upon or near the tracks in the vicinity of San Fernando Road and Doran Street - at the City of Los Angeles / Glendale border, with the train continuing a short distance 'northbound' before coming to an emergency stop, upright and on the tracks. The driver and sole occupant of the vehicle that was struck, was found walking nearby and initially appeared uninjured. The train crew (One Engineer and One Conductor), and approximately 95 passengers among the four passenger rail cars, have denied injury. As the incident location was determined to be within Glendale city limits, the Glendale Fire Department is in Command, and LAFD is an assisting agency. Media Inquiries: Glendale FD and Metrolink.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E250 E35 E42 E56 EM1 RA1 RA3 RA56 RA6 RA806 RA82 RA835 T50 + Glendale FD; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 08/25/2023 INC#1695

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1695; 10:16PM; 8022 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45JtxTR; #SunValley; The first arriving 36 LAFD Firefighters took just 23 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a vacant 7.000 square-foot combination one- and two-story former restaurant that had fire through the roof on their arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E239 E24 E27 E274 E289 E298 E60 E77 E88 E89 E98 EA1 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA81 RA860 RA889 RA89 RA98 SO1 T27 T39 T74 T89 T98 UR27 UR88; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1695; 09:53PM; 8036 N Vineland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45JtxTR; #SunValley; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations at a vacant one story restaurant with fire through the roof. ; FS 77; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC12 BC14 BC5 CM40 CM42 E227 E239 E24 E274 E289 E298 E60 E77 E88 E89 E98 EM14 EM15 HR3 RA81 RA889 RA89 RA98 T27 T39 T74 T89 T98 UR27 UR88 ; CH9; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1624; 08:58PM; 1534 W 19th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45HuNH8; #SanPedro; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision with one vehicle overturned. Two patients total, one of whom is in critical condition with unspecified injuries - and was trapped in their overturned vehicle, the other patient from the other vehicle has non-life threatening injuries, was not trapped, and has been taken to an area hospital in fair condition. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #4077).; FS 101; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E101 E112 E248 E48 EM13 HR3 RA101 RA112 RA36 T48; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1258; 05:39PM; 7106 S Avalon Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUiy5J; #Florence; *Address Tentative*. PRELIM: Fire through the roof of a vacant 100' x 75' one-story metal clad commercial building with two nearby structures threatened. ; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E203 E221 E233 E264 E266 E3 E33 E57 E64 E65 EA1 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA833 SO1 SQ21 T21 T3 T33 T64 T66 UR3 UR88; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1227; 05:49PM; 9300 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZIf4p2; #Palms; *Address Remains Tentative*. 37 LAFD Firefighters took just 31 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames within a well involved vacant and boarded one-story home, that had flames through the roof on firefighters arrival. The building is the site of a previous fire. No injuries. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E263 E292 E294 E43 E59 E94 RA92 RA94 SO1 T63 T92 T94; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1227; 05:18PM; 9300 W Exposition Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZIf4p2; #Palms; Address Tentative. #PRELIM: Defensive fire attack on fire through the roof of a vacant and boarded one-story home, the site of a previous fire.; FS 43; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E292 E294 E43 E59 RA92 T92 T94; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey
